Indented text blocks (blockquotes) are rendered as paragraphs with a class of "indent-*"
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote.
    It can span multiple lines.
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">This is a blockquote.
It can span multiple lines.</p>
.

Indented text blocks are separated by blank lines
.
Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

    Blockquote text
    
    Blockquote text

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Indents are counted in multiples of four spaces or one tab
.
Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

        Blockquote text

		Blockquote text

	Blockquote text

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-2">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-2">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Text indents are normalized to four spaces
.
Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

.

<p class="indent-2">Blockquote text</p>
.

Escapes, html entities, and inline markers function within indented text blocks
.
text with **inlines**, \[backslash escapes\], typography(tm), "smart quotes", character references (&#x1f600;) &amp;&nbsp;entities.

    text with **inlines**, \[backslash escapes\], typography(tm), "smart quotes", character references (&#x1f600;) &amp;&nbsp;entities.
.

Thematic breaks and headings do not receive the indent class
.
    * * *

    ---

    # ATX Heading

    SEText Heading
    --------------
.
<hr />

<h1>ATX Heading</h1>
<h2>SEText Heading</h2>
.

When part of a paragraph, indented text blocks are rendered as `q.blockquote` elements
.
Foo
    bar
        baz
.
<p>Foo
<q class="blockquote indent-1">bar</q>
<q class="blockquote indent-2">baz</q></p>
.

At the beginning of a paragraph, indented text blocks are only rendered as q.blockquote if they contain more than one line
.
    foo
bar
baz

    foo
    bar
baz
.
<p>foo
bar
baz</p>
<p><q class="blockquote indent-1">foo
bar</q>
baz</p>
.

This is true whenever the first line is indented four spaces beyond the rest of the paragraph
.
        foo
    bar
.
<p class="indent-1">foo
bar</p>
.

Inside a paragraph, indented text blocks are rendered as `q.blockquote` elements
.
Paragraph text:
    Indented quote
    on two lines.
more paragraph text.
.
<p>Paragraph text:
<q class="blockquote indent-1">Indented quote
on two lines.</q>
more paragraph text.</p>
.

Indented text blocks are still inside a paragraph if separated by a blank line that is indented
.
Paragraph text:
    
    Indented quote.
    
more paragraph text.
.
<p>Paragraph text:
<q class="blockquote indent-1">Indented quote.</q>
more paragraph text.</p>
.

Blank lines around indented quotes are not rendered.
.

    
    foo
    

.
<p class="indent-1">foo</p>
.

Trailing spaces are not rendered in blockquotes.
.
    foo  
.
<p class="indent-1">foo</p>
.

Code fences get the indent class
.
    ```
    aaa
    ```
.
<pre class="indent-1"><code>
aaa
</code></pre>
.

Link reference definitions work even if they are indented
.
    [foo]: /url "title"

[foo]
.
<a href="/url" title="title">foo</a>
.

Commonmark block quotes get the indent class
.
    > # Foo
    > bar
    > baz
.
<blockquote class="indent-1">
<h1>Foo</h1>
<p>bar
baz</p>
</blockquote>
.
